trans-unit.source: Represents a fixed precision and scale numeric value between -10 <sup>27</sup> -1 and 10 <sup>27</sup> -1 to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示固定的精度和小数位数之间的数值-10 <sup>27</sup> -1 和 10 <sup>27</sup> -1 以存储中或从数据库中检索。

trans-unit.source: To obtain an OracleNumber object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleNumber%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取 OracleNumber 对象，请调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleNumber%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: Oracle numeric data types can store up to 27 decimal digits of precision.
trans-unit.target: Oracle 数值数据类型可以存储最多为 27 的精度的十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: When converting Oracle numeric values to common language runtime data types, the Oracle value might be too large.
trans-unit.target: 当将 Oracle 数字值转换为公共语言运行时数据类型，Oracle 值可能太大。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when converting a numeric value of a common language runtime data types to an OracleNumber, the numeric value may be either too large or too high precision for the OracleNumber.
trans-unit.target: 相反，当将数值的公共语言运行时数据类型转换为 OracleNumber，数字值可能太大或过高精度 OracleNumber。

trans-unit.source: Either of these cases will cause an Oracle ORA-22053 overflow error.
trans-unit.target: 无论是哪种情况下将导致 Oracle ORA&22053; 溢出错误。

trans-unit.source: If your Oracle database might contain large values, you should use the OracleNumber data type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 Oracle 数据库可能包含较大的值，应使用 OracleNumber 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: You can then convert to the common language runtime data type explicitly, and catch or handle any errors.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以显式转换为公共语言运行时数据类型，并捕捉或处理任何错误。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>结构使用提供<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> structure to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 将的此实例进行比较<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>与提供的对象的结构并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示该实例和对象的相对值。

trans-unit.source: Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object, or the object is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 此实例是否大于的对象，或该对象为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> and the two are equal, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

The constant e equals 2.71828182845904, the base of the natural logarithm.

A number raised to the power of p.

trans-unit.source: This number has a greater precision than what a common language run-time `Double` data type can contain.
trans-unit.target: 此数字具有比哪些公共语言运行时更高的精度`Double`可以包含数据类型。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to store this value in a `Double`, the value is rounded up to 1E+126.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试存储中的此值`Double`，值向上舍入为 1E + 126。

trans-unit.source: The maximum `Double` value that can be used in the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> (Double) constructor is: 9.99999999999999E+125.
trans-unit.target: 最大值`Double`值，可在<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>(Double) 的构造函数是︰ 9.99999999999999 e + 125。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> structure.
This property is read-only.
If you attempt to retrieve a value outside the allowable range, Oracle returns the "OCI-22053: overflow error" message.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试检索的值超出了允许的范围，Oracle 返回"oci-22053︰ 溢出错误"消息。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.ToString%2A> method to retrieve such values.
Returns the value 0.

trans-unit.target: 零可用于执行计算或作为参数值。
